headline: In Yemen, Death Toll Rises to 76 in Drone and Missile Attack on Government Base
abstract: A top U.N. official warned that the rebel assault on government forces could set back peace efforts.
lead_paragraph: AL MUKALLA, Yemen — The death toll in a drone and missile attack on a government military training base in central Yemen rose to at least 76 on Sunday, representing an escalation bound to complicate international efforts to end the country’s prolonged war.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
